issue.title: [CF 521] Druid issue (r529)
issue.body:
The stated version does not seem to function for druids; no bar appears in the configuration mode.


> Posted by CurseForge user ethak | Imported from CurseForge issue #521 | Raw

comments.body:
Had the same problem. I deleted WTF and Interface folders and recreated everything from scratch....since then it works....like a charm.

See also: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/tickets/518-no-icon-groups-in-config-mode-mop-beta/


> Posted by CurseForge user wytheron

Please do not ignore the default ticket template. You need to upload a copy of your saved variables so that I may diagnose the issue.

Also, is this happening on live or on beta servers?

If you do not have Lua errors enabled, please enable them and post anything that pops up. The report that you have given me tells me pretty much nothing at all about the issue.

Edited Aug 9, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

Right, sorry about that. To be frank, I'm not very familiar with these things.

Anyway, the issue was occurring in the beta, and only on my druid (shaman and paladin worked just fine). By the looks of it, the ticket Wytheron linked describes the problem I had as well. Unfortunately I'm unable to link the saved variables, as I deleted all TMW -related files in an attempt to fix the issue. If it's any help, deleting the the druid's own saved variables file wasn't enough to fix it.

I do have lua errors enabled; no errors occurred.

A complete re-installation of the addon seems to have fixed it, though.


> Posted by CurseForge user ethak

Cause of issue was discovered. Fix imminent.

http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/tickets/518-no-icon-groups-in-config-mode-for-resto-druids-mop/


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
